hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash sudo setfacl -m user:jenkins:rwx /dev/ttyUSB1 sudo setfacl -m user:jenkins:rw /var/www/iomate/serial_switch_deploy.log sudo setfacl -m user:jenkins:rw /var/www/iomate/serial_switch_erase.log sudo setfacl -m user:jenkins:rw /var/www/iomate/serial_switch_reboot.log cd /var/www/iomate source iomateenv/bin/activate python /var/www/iomate/serial_deploy_sw_with_erase.py output/customer-sw-2-singleport.deploy /dev/ttyUSB1
